cards.question: Sing the chorus of a song you hate in a dramatic opera voice.
Do 10 push-ups while shouting your favorite food with each rep.
Text a random contact ‘I’m joining a circus!’ and show the reply.
Wear socks on your hands for the next three turns.
Imitate a chicken for 30 seconds, full commitment.
Call a friend and convince them you saw a UFO today.
Dance like nobody’s watching for one minute, no music.
Say everything in a pirate accent for the next two turns.
Make up a jingle for a fake product and sing it loudly.
Pretend to be a robot for one minute, complete with sound effects.
Post a silly selfie on your story with the caption ‘Living my best life!’
Eat a spoonful of a condiment chosen by the group.
Do an impression of your favorite celebrity, go all out.
Challenge someone to a thumb war and lose dramatically.
Speak in slow motion for the next two turns.
Wear a towel as a cape for the next three turns.
Make animal noises every time someone says your name for 10 minutes.
Perform a 30-second infomercial for a random object nearby.
Swap shoes with the person to your left for two turns.
Try to juggle three random items for 15 seconds.
Announce ‘I’m unstoppable!’ before every action for three turns.
Do a catwalk strut across the room like you’re on a runway.
Talk like you’re underwater for one minute.
Create a handshake with the person to your right and perform it.
Pretend to be a news anchor reporting a ridiculous made-up story.
Hold an ice cube until it melts without flinching.
Sing ‘Happy Birthday’ to yourself in a public voice.
Do 20 jumping jacks while reciting a nursery rhyme.
Wear your shirt inside out for the next three turns.
Imitate another player’s laugh for one minute.
Serenade a stranger (or the group) with a love song, full passion!
Pretend to be a fitness guru and lead a 30-second workout.
Make up a rap about the last thing you ate.
Speak only in rhymes for the next two turns.
Do a dramatic slow-motion fall and stay down for 10 seconds.
Try to balance a spoon on your nose for 30 seconds.
Proclaim you’re running for mayor and give a one-minute speech!
Pretend to be a dog excited to see its owner for 30 seconds.
Draw a mustache on your face with a washable marker (or finger).
Narrate what you’re doing in third person for two turns.
Sing everything you say for the next three turns.
OUTRAGEOUS: Dance like a robot in a public space for 30 seconds!
Challenge someone to a staring contest and lose on purpose.
Pretend to be a chef presenting a gourmet dish with random snacks.
Do a one-minute impression of a grumpy old person.
Wrap yourself in a blanket and declare yourself a burrito.
Call a pizza place and order a pizza with only jellybeans!
Talk like you’re in a Shakespeare play for one minute.
Put on a random hat (or make one) and wear it for three turns.
Do a 30-second interpretive dance about your day.
Pretend to be a motivational speaker for one minute.
Try to say the alphabet backwards in under 30 seconds.
Yell ‘I love this game!’ out a window!
Make a tower with random items and defend why it’s art.
Speak only in whispers for the next two turns.
Pretend to be a superhero revealing your origin story.
Do a one-minute air guitar solo to an imaginary song.
Wear underwear on your head for two turns!
Imitate a cartoon character chosen by the group.
Try to wink at everyone without laughing for one minute.
Pretend to be a time traveler confused by modern objects.
Fake cry dramatically about losing a sock!
Do a 30-second commercial for a terrible fake app.
Talk like you’re on fast-forward for one minute.
Make up a secret agent code name and use it for three turns.
Text your mom you’re moving to a llama farm!
Pretend to be a cat for 30 seconds, full purrs and meows.
Wear one shoe on the wrong foot for two turns.
Do a one-minute lip-sync battle with an imaginary song.
Propose to a random object with a speech!
Pretend to be a game show contestant overly excited for 30 seconds.
Make up a story about why you’re late using only sound effects.
Sing a pop song in a heavy metal scream!
Do a 30-second dance like you’re underwater.
Pretend to be a wizard casting silly spells for one minute.
Wear a sock as a glove for the next three turns.
Announce you’re quitting to become a mime!
Try to make everyone laugh with a bad joke.
Pretend to be a tour guide for a boring object nearby.
Do a one-minute impression of a hyper toddler.
Fake a slow-motion fight scene with yourself!
Talk like you’re auditioning for a movie for two turns.
Pretend to be a scientist revealing a dumb invention.
Wear a blanket as a royal robe and demand respect!
Do a 30-second dance inspired by a vegetable.
Pretend to be a radio DJ hyping up a fake song.
Call a friend and sing them a random jingle!
Make up a secret society and describe its handshake.
Pretend to be a spy on a mission for one minute.
Do a 30-second workout led by an imaginary drill sergeant.
Declare you’re starting a band called ‘The Couch Potatoes’!
Talk like you’re in a cheesy rom-com for two turns.
Pretend to be a chef yelling orders in a fake kitchen.
Fake a loud argument with an invisible person!
Do a one-minute dance like you’re a malfunctioning robot.
Pretend to be an alien trying to order food.
Proclaim you’re inventing a sport called ‘Extreme Napping’!
Make up a poem about a random object nearby.
Pretend to be a motivational coach for a lazy goldfish.
Announce you’re retiring to become a professional unicyclist!
